body: Thanks for the context man. Ahora directo a favoritos

I felt a little bit bad for Mitsuri at first but it turned out okay.

Shinobu is shown to be a player. Maybe that’s why she dated an older woman (big boobs) with a beauty mark, someone who resembles Mitsuri. 

However she only takes a step once she finds Mitsuri on a “date” with her sister, Kanae Shinobu gets angry and dumps her gf and brings Mitsuri to her house.

However Mitsuri stops Shinobu from kissing her, telling her that she shouldn’t cheat on her gf and Shinobu gets out of the room and breaks up with her gf in less than a minute and continues to have sex with Mitsuri.

After all that it turns out that she’s been in love with Mitsuri for a long time and apologizes for forcing herself and a happy ending where Mitsuri accepts Shinobu.
